answerText: Debye length[10] The Debye length is also the characteristic shielding radius for this fundamental phase of matter, which is basically a fluid of charged particles.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | MCTC | 9 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Identify this quantity, which measures the range over which electric fields are screened or shielded.
